title: Skene Growth CLI - Product-Led Growth Template
description: Tracks user journey and growth metrics for the Skene Growth CLI tool.

milestones.title: Website Visit
milestones.description: User visits the Skene Growth website or documentation.

milestones.title: Github Stargazing
milestones.description: User stars the Skene Growth repository on Github

milestones.title: Documentation Read
milestones.description: User reads a significant part of the documentation to understand the CLI's capabilities.

metrics.name: Website Conversion Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of users visiting the site who become users / Total website visitors

metrics.name: Github Stars
metrics.howToMeasure: Count of total stars on the project repository

metrics.name: Documentation Engagement
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of users visiting documentation / Total website visitors

milestones.title: Installation
milestones.description: User successfully installs the Skene Growth CLI tool.

milestones.title: First Command Execution
milestones.description: User runs their first command (e.g., `skene-growth plan`).

milestones.title: Successful Template Generation
milestones.description: User creates a basic growth template using the CLI.

metrics.name: Installation Success Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of successful installations / Total download attempts

metrics.name: Time to First Command
metrics.howToMeasure: Time elapsed between installation and first command execution.

metrics.name: Template Generation Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of users generating a template / Total number of users running the CLI.

metrics.name: Successful Plan Generation
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of users who successfully generate a plan / Number of installations

milestones.title: Daily Log Integration
milestones.description: User integrates daily logs into their workflow.

milestones.title: Growth Objective Definition
milestones.description: User defines growth objectives using the CLI.

milestones.title: Weekly Active Users
milestones.description: User uses the CLI at least once per week

metrics.name: Daily Log Integration Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of users integrated / Total number of users

metrics.name: Objective Definition Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of users defining objectives / Total number of users

metrics.name: Weekly Active Users (WAU)
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of unique users using the CLI at least once a week.

metrics.name: Command Usage
metrics.howToMeasure: Average number of commands executed per user per week.

milestones.title: Continued Usage
milestones.description: User consistently uses the CLI over a period of several months.

milestones.title: Community Engagement
milestones.description: User participates in the community forum or contributes to the project.

milestones.title: Feedback Submission
milestones.description: User provides feedback or feature requests for the CLI.

metrics.name: Monthly Active Users (MAU)
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of unique users using the CLI at least once a month.

metrics.name: User Retention Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: Percentage of users who continue using the CLI after 3 months.

metrics.name: Community Contribution Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of users contributing to the community / Total number of users.

metrics.name: Active Community
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of forum posts and issues created/commented on

metadata.usage: Track user behavior and PLG metrics for a command-line tool.
